# Extendicare Maintenance Inspection Checklist## Equipment
**Name:** Garburator
**Year:** All
**Manufacturer:** All
**Model:** All### Legend/Key
| Legend | Key          |
|--------|--------------|
| W      | Weekly       |
| M      | Monthly      |
| Q      | Quarterly    |
| S      | Semi-Annual  |
| A      | Annual       |
| O      | Ok           |
| R      | Repair       |
| N      | Replace      |### Checks
| W | M | Q | S | A | Item                                                                 |
|---|---|---|---|---|----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| X |   |   |   |   | 1. Check start/stop switch operation. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 2. Check water flow control nozzle for obstructions during operation. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 3. Check for unusual noises and/or vibrations during operation. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 4. Check for proper flow of drain lines. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 5. Clean the water supply line screen. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 6. Check for wear on the cutting blocks. Adjust or replace as necessary. |
|   |   | X |   |   | 7. Lubricate as called for in the manufacturer’s lubrication information.

|
|   |   | X |   |   | 7. Lubricate as called for in the manufacturer’s lubrication information. |### Monthly Schedule
| Month | M | Q | S | A |
|-------|---|---|---|---|

| FEB   | W | W | W | W |
| MAR   | W | W | W | W |
| APR   | W | W | W | W |
| MAY   | W | W | W | W |
| JUN   | W | W | W | W |
| JUL   | W | W | W | W |
| AUG   | W | W | W | W |
| SEP   | W | W | W | W |
| OCT   | W | W | W | W |
| NOV   | W | W | W | W |
| DEC   | W | W | W | W |----**Note:** This document is uncontrolled when printed.
